method.name: Locate
method.abstract: Locate a target IUnknown from a List of IUnknown interface pointers.

enum.name: CATSchGRRRouteReshapeMode
enum.abstract: Flag for whether or not the route shape is fixed.

enum.name: CATSchMIOImageStatus
enum.abstract: Status of the image in MIO.

enum.name: CATSchRouteCompressMode
enum.abstract: Flag for whether or not to compress a schematic route, i.

enum.name: CATSchRouteSymbolUpdateMode
enum.abstract: Flag for whether or not to update location of route symbols when setting a route's path.

enum.name: CATSchRouteUnsetGapsMode
enum.abstract: Flag for whether or not to unset gaps when setting a route's path.

class.name: CATISchAnnotationBreak
class.abstract: Interface to manage annotation break.

method.name: FlipOverLine
method.abstract: Mirror the symbol over the route segment line that ends in the connector on which the symbol is placed.

method.name: FlipOverOrthogonalLine
method.abstract: Mirror the symbol over the line orthogonal to the route segment line that ends in the connector on which the symbol is placed and going through the connector's position.

method.name: Scale
method.abstract: Scale the symbol.

class.name: CATISchAppCompatible
class.abstract: Interface to query an application component whether an application route or component can be connected.

method.name: AppIsTargetOKForInsert
method.abstract: Query whether a component (source) is compatible to be inserted into this route.

method.name: AppIsTargetOKForPlace
method.abstract: Query whether a component (source) is compatible to be connected to "this" object (the target, which can be a route or a component).

method.name: AppIsTargetOKForRoute
method.abstract: Query whether a route of the input class type can be connected to "this" object (the target, which can be a route or a component).

class.name: CATISchAppComponent
class.abstract: Interface to manage an application component object.

method.name: AppCreateComponentInst
method.abstract: Create a component instance.

method.name: AppCreateLocalReference
method.abstract: Create Local Reference object.

method.name: AppGetDefaultGRRName2
method.abstract: Get the default graphical representation names of an application component.

method.name: AppListGRRNames2
method.abstract: Find all the valid graphical representation names of an application component.

method.name: AppOKToFlipConnected
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to reconnect a component to a different compatible configuration.

method.name: AppOKToFlipHorizontal
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to flip the application component about Y.

method.name: AppOKToFlipOnLine
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to flip a component about its inserted line.

method.name: AppOKToFlipVertical
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to flip the application component about X.

method.name: AppOKToPlaceInSpace
method.abstract: Query whether the application component can be placed in free space.

method.name: AppOKToScale
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to scale the application component.

method.name: AppOKToSlide
method.abstract: Query whether the application component can be slided.

method.name: AppOKToUninsert
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to uninsert the application component.

method.name: AppPostFlipConnectedProcess
method.abstract: Post process after reconnecting a component to a different compatible configuration.

method.name: AppPostFlipHorizontalProcess
method.abstract: Post process after flipping a component in "x".

method.name: AppPostFlipOnLineProcess
method.abstract: Post process after flipping an inserted component about the inserted line segment of the route.

method.name: AppPostFlipVerticalProcess
method.abstract: Post process after flipping a component in "y".

method.name: AppPostPlaceProcess
method.abstract: Post process after placing an application component instance.

method.name: AppPostSlideProcess
method.abstract: Post process after sliding a component.

method.name: AppPostSwitchGraphicProcess
method.abstract: Post process after switching a component's graphic representation.

method.name: AppPostUninsertProcess
method.abstract: Post process after uninserting a component, disconnecting it from a route.

class.name: CATISchAppConnectable
class.abstract: Interface to mangage application object behaviors in making connections.

method.name: AppAddConnector
method.abstract: Add a connector.

method.name: AppGetReferenceName
method.abstract: Get the reference name of a connectable.

method.name: AppListConnectables
method.abstract: Find all the application objects connected to this object through their connectors.

method.name: AppListConnectors
method.abstract: Find all the connectors of this application object.

method.name: AppListValidCntrTypes
method.abstract: List the valid application connector types allowed to be created.

method.name: AppRemoveConnector
method.abstract: Remove a connector.

method.name: AppSetReferenceName
method.abstract: Set the reference name of a connectable.

class.name: CATISchAppConnection
class.abstract: Interface to mangage application connection object behaviors.

method.name: AppAddConnector
method.abstract: Add a connector.

method.name: AppListConnectables
method.abstract: Find all the application object connected to this connection through their connectors.

method.name: AppListConnectors
method.abstract: Find all the connectors included in this connection.

method.name: AppRemoveConnector
method.abstract: Remove a connector.

class.name: CATISchAppConnector
class.abstract: Interface to mangage application connector object behaviors.

method.name: AppConnect
method.abstract: Connect to an input connector.

method.name: AppConnectBranch
method.abstract: Connect to an input connector for Branch.

method.name: AppDisconnect
method.abstract: Disconnect from an input connector.

method.name: AppGetAssociatedConnectable
method.abstract: Find the application object that owns this connector.

method.name: AppIsCntrConnected
method.abstract: Query whether the connector has been connected.

method.name: AppListCompatibleTypes
method.abstract: Find all the class types of connector that are compatible with this connector for connections.

method.name: AppListConnections
method.abstract: Find all the connections that include this connector.

method.name: AppOKToNoShowConnectedCntr
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to no show the connector after it is connected.

method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to scale the component.

method.name: OKToSlide
method.abstract: Query whether the component can be slided.

method.name: OKToUninsert

method.name: Slide

method.name: OKToBreak
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to break.

method.name: OKToConcatenate
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to concatenate.

method.name: OKToModifyPoints
method.abstract: Query whether it is OK to modify (add or remove) the points.

method.name: RemovePoints
method.abstract: Remove points from route.

method.name: ReshapeExtremity
method.abstract: Change the position of the extremity of the route.

method.name: ReshapeExtremity
method.abstract: Change the position of the extremity of the route.

method.name: SetPath
method.abstract: Set the defining points of a route.

class.name: CATISchRouteAlternateGraphic
class.abstract: Interface to manage Schematic component's association with its alternate graphic representation objects.

method.name: AddAlternateGraphic
method.abstract: Add an alternate graphical primitive to a route.

method.name: ListAlternateGraphics
method.abstract: Lists the alternate graphics of a route.

method.name: RemoveAllAlternateGraphics
method.abstract: Removes all alternate graphical primitives.

method.name: RemoveAllAlternateGraphicsOfStyle
method.abstract: Removes all alternate graphical primitives of the given style.

method.name: RemoveAlternateGraphic
method.abstract: Remove an alternate graphical primitive from a route.

class.name: CATISchRouteGraphic
class.abstract: Interface to manage Schematic component's association with its graphic representation objects.

method.name: AddGraphicalPrimitive
method.abstract: Add a graphical primitive to a route.

method.name: ListGraphicalPrimitives
method.abstract: List all graphical primitives of a route.

method.name: RemoveAllGraphicalPrimitives
method.abstract: Remove all graphical primitives of a route, including alternate graphical primitives.

method.name: RemoveGraphicalPrimitive
method.abstract: Remove a graphical primitive from a route.

class.name: CATISchRouteSymbol
class.abstract: Interface to manage a symbol placed on a route.

method.name: FlipOverLine
method.abstract: Mirror the symbol over the route segment line on which the symbol is positioned.

method.name: FlipOverOrthogonalLine
method.abstract: Mirror the symbol over the line orthogonal to the route segment line on which the symbol is positioned and going through the symbol's position point on that segment line.

method.name: GetGRRRoute
method.abstract: Get the graphical representation of a schematic route that owns this symbol.

method.name: GetPosition
method.abstract: Get the symbol's position on the route that own it.

method.name: Scale
method.abstract: Scale the symbol.

method.name: SetPosition
method.abstract: Set the symbol's position on the route that own it.

class.name: CATISchSelectMoveSelector
class.abstract: Interface to manage direct manipulation of schematic objects.

method.name: GetManipulatedElement
method.abstract: Return the object to be used for direct manipulation.

class.name: CATISchSession
class.abstract: Interface to manage document sessions with Schematic context.

method.name: CreateDocument
method.abstract: Create a document with Schematic context.

method.name: GetCurrentApplicationID
method.abstract: Get the current application ID.

method.name: GetCurrentDocument
method.abstract: Get the current document.

method.name: GetSchExtContainer
method.abstract: Get the schematic container (e.

method.name: GetSchObjInterface
method.abstract: Get the specified interface for the requested object.

method.name: SetCurrentApplicationID
method.abstract: Set the current application ID.

method.name: SetCurrentDocument
method.abstract: Set the current document.

class.name: CATISchZone
class.abstract: Interface to manage a Schematic zone object.

method.name: UpdateBoundedElements
method.abstract: Update the zone members based on the current zone boundaries.

class.name: CATISchZoneGraphic
class.abstract: Interface to manage schematic zone's association with its graphical representations.

method.name: AddGraphicalRepresentation
method.abstract: Add a graphical representation to a zone.

method.name: ListGraphicalRepresentations
method.abstract: List all graphical representations of a zone.

method.name: RemoveGraphicalRepresentation
method.abstract: Remove a graphical representation from a zone.

class.name: CATISchZoneMembership
class.abstract: Interface to manage a Schematic zone member object.

method.name: UpdateZoneMembership
method.abstract: Check all zones geometric boundaries and put this element into the correct zone membership lists.

class.name: CATISchematicExtension
class.abstract: Interface to add schematic extensions to existing application objects.

method.name: AddExtension
method.abstract: Adds a Schematic extension to an application object.

method.name: RemoveExtension
method.abstract: Removes a Schematic extension to an application object.

class.name: CATISchematicInit
class.abstract: Interface to manage a Schematic document initialization.

method.name: CreateDefaultWindow
method.abstract: Create the 2D window for the schematic document.

method.name: GetActiveObject
method.abstract: Get the current UI-active object.

method.name: GetDefaultCommand
method.abstract: Get the default command of the current workbench or workshop.

method.name: GetEditor
method.abstract: Get the editor of the schematic document.

method.name: GetWorkshop
method.abstract: Get the current workshop name.

class.name: CATIScuWksConfigAddin
class.abstract: Interface to add toolbars in the CATDiagram workbench.

class.name: CATIScuWksConfiguration
class.abstract: Interface that users should implement to extend the CATDiagram workshop.
